articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: Google is replacing Google Assistant with Gemini - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google will replace Google Assistant on Android phones with Gemini later this year, the company announced on Friday.
articles.content:
Google will replace Google Assistant on Android phones with Gemini later this year, the company announced on Friday.

articles.title: Scientists manage to freeze light, convert it into a solid: Here's how they did it - Hindustan Times
articles.description: New research reveals light can behave as a supersolid, paving the way for advancements in quantum computing and optical technologies.
articles.content: In a breakthrough, Italian scientists have successfully "frozen" light, demonstrating that it can behave as a supersolid - a rare state of matter that exhibits both solid-like structure and frictionl… [+2353 chars]
